version.query: ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` ADD `linkedin_company` varchar(50) NULL AFTER `linkedin`;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_announcement` MODIFY COLUMN `created` datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_announcement` SET created='1000-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE created='0000-00-00 00:00:00'
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_announcement` MODIFY COLUMN `publish_up` datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_announcement` SET publish_up='1000-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE publish_up='0000-00-00 00:00:00'
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_announcement` MODIFY COLUMN `publish_down` datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_announcement` SET publish_down='1000-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE publish_down='0000-00-00 00:00:00'
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` MODIFY COLUMN `checked_out_time` datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_announcement` SET checked_out_time='1000-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE checked_out_time='0000-00-00 00:00:00'
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_polls_users` MODIFY COLUMN `lasttime` datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_announcement` SET lasttime='1000-01-01 00:00:00' WHERE lasttime='0000-00-00 00:00:00'
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` CHANGE `qq` `qqsocial` varchar(50);
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` MODIFY banned datetime NULL DEFAULT '1000-01-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_users_banned` SET `expiration` = '9999-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE expiration = '0000-00-00 00:00:00';
UPDATE `#__kunena_users` SET `banned` = '9999-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE banned = '0000-00-00 00:00:00';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE parent_id parentid int(11) NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE pub_access pubAccess int(11) NOT NULL default '1';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE pub_recurse pubRecurse tinyint(4) NULL default '1';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE admin_access adminAccess int(11) NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE admin_recurse adminRecurse tinyint(4) NULL default '1';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE allow_anonymous allowAnonymous tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE post_anonymous postAnonymous tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE allow_polls allowPolls tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE ttopic_ordering opicOrdering varchar(16) NOT NULL default 'lastpost';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE allow_ratings allowRatings tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_ranks` CHANGE rank_id rankId mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_ranks` CHANGE rank_title rankTitle varchar(255) NOT NULL default '';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_ranks` CHANGE rank_min rankMin mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_ranks` CHANGE rank_special rankSpecial tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_ranks` CHANGE rank_image rankImage varchar(255);
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` ADD reddit varchar(75) NULL AFTER `youtube`;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` ADD github varchar(75) NULL AFTER `google`;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` ADD vimeo varchar(75) NULL AFTER `qzone`;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_users` ADD pinterest varchar(75) NULL AFTER `yim`;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE topic_ordering topicOrdering varchar(16) NOT NULL default 'lastpost';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_categories` CHANGE `ordering` `ordering` INT(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_user_topics` CHANGE `params` `params` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `#__kunena_user_categories` CHANGE `params` `params` TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL;
